nodes.description: 1999年9月4日，达吉斯坦共和国的布伊纳克斯克发生公寓楼爆炸，造成64人死亡。
nodes.support_text: The first of the apartment bombings, on Sept. 4, had killed 64 people in Buynaksk, in the republic of Dagestan, which borders Chechnya.

nodes.description: 1999年9月9日，莫斯科发生公寓楼爆炸。
nodes.support_text: Then, blasts in Moscow on Sept. 9 and Sept. 13 killed 228 people.

nodes.description: 1999年9月13日，莫斯科再次发生公寓楼爆炸。
nodes.support_text: Then, blasts in Moscow on Sept. 9 and Sept. 13 killed 228 people.

nodes.description: 1999年9月16日，伏尔加顿斯克市发生公寓楼爆炸，造成18人死亡。
nodes.support_text: The last explosion was Sept. 16 in Volgodonsk, 600 miles south of Moscow, which killed 18 people.

nodes.description: 1999年9月22日，梁赞市公寓楼司机卡尔托费尔尼科夫因发现可疑车辆而报警。
nodes.support_text: Arriving home, Kartofelnikov noticed a car parked near the entryway... Suspicious, he called police.

nodes.description: 1999年9月22日，警方在卡尔托费尔尼科夫居住的公寓楼地下室发现了疑似炸弹装置。
nodes.support_text: But in the basement, officers discovered what appeared to be a bomb made with sacks of white powder in the basement of his apartment block.

nodes.description: 1999年9月23日，俄罗斯以此为借口在车臣发动第二次战争。
nodes.support_text: The Ryazan case might have remained a historical footnote had the Kremlin not launched its second war in Chechnya that month, a tough response that contributed greatly to the popularity of the new prime minister, Vladimir V. Putin.

nodes.description: 1999年9月24日，内政部长称阻止了一场爆炸，但FSB局长却反驳称这只是一场演习。
nodes.support_text: Two days later, the interior minister said authorities had prevented another attack. But the director of the Federal Security Service, or FSB, the main successor to the KGB, contradicted him, saying it was an exercise by his agency.

nodes.description: 2000年3月，普京凭借其强硬立场获得的声望当选为俄罗斯总统。
nodes.support_text: Riding that popularity, Putin was elected president six months later.

nodes.description: 在2000年和2004年的总统选举中，普京的挑战者提出政府可能参与爆炸案的指控。
nodes.support_text: The charge that officials might be complicit in the apartment bombings was raised by challengers to Putin in the 2000 and 2004 presidential elections.

nodes.description: 2002年，前克格勃特工利特维年科出版书籍，指控FSB策划爆炸案以助普京上台。
nodes.support_text: Litvinenko made that argument in a 2002 book, “Blowing Up Russia: Terror From Within,” which he wrote with historian Yuri Felshtinsky.

nodes.description: 2004年，导演涅克拉索夫拍摄了一部关于爆炸案的电影。
nodes.support_text: Andrei Nekrasov, a friend of Litvinenko who directed a 2004 film about the bombings, said he believed that the poisoning of Litvinenko might have been an attempt to eliminate a dangerous critic...

nodes.description: 2006年10月，调查车臣问题的记者安娜·波利特科夫斯卡娅被枪杀。
nodes.support_text: ...and journalist Anna Politkovskaya. The latter, who focused on reports of abuses by Russian security forces in the separatist republic of Chechnya, was shot in her Moscow apartment building in October.

nodes.description: 2006年11月，利特维年科因放射性物质中毒身亡，其临终指控再次引发对爆炸案的质疑。
nodes.support_text: The latest were former KGB agent Alexander Litvinenko, who was poisoned by radioactive polonium-210... His death in November has given new prominence to doubts about Ryazan and the apartment bombings.

nodes.support_text: Mikhail Trepashkin 泄露了国家机密。

nodes.description: 当局起诉了 Trepashkin。
nodes.support_text: 当局起诉了 Trepashkin。

nodes.description: 法庭认定 Mikhail Trepashkin 有罪。
nodes.support_text: 法庭认定 Mikhail Trepashkin 有罪。

nodes.description: 法庭判处 Mikhail Trepashkin 四年监禁。
nodes.support_text: 法庭判处 Mikhail Trepashkin 四年监禁。

nodes.description: 未指明的行动者将手枪栽赃到了 Trepashkin 的车里。
nodes.support_text: 未指明的行动者将手枪栽赃到了 Trepashkin 的车里。

nodes.description: Trepashkin 非法持有一把手枪。
nodes.support_text: Trepashkin 非法持有一把手枪。

nodes.description: Trepashkin 因非法持有手枪被判一年徒刑。
nodes.support_text: Trepashkin 因非法持有手枪被判一年徒刑。

nodes.description: Trepashkin 声称手枪是被人栽赃到他车里的。
nodes.support_text: Trepashkin 声称手枪是被人栽赃到他车里的。

nodes.description: Trepashkin 声称自己之所以被起诉，是因为他对公寓楼爆炸案的调查。
nodes.support_text: Trepashkin 声称自己之所以被起诉，是因为他对公寓楼爆炸案的调查。

nodes.description: 克里姆林宫否认与利特维年科及其他人的死亡有任何关系。
nodes.support_text: The Kremlin has denied that it had anything to do with the death of Litvinenko, or any of the others.

nodes.description: 人们正在提出（一些）问题。
nodes.support_text: people are raising the questions

nodes.description: 沃尔特（利特维年科的父亲）想要得到一些答案。
nodes.support_text: Walter (Litvinenko’s father) wants some answers.

nodes.description: 沃尔特向俄罗斯大使馆递交了一本他儿子书的副本。
nodes.support_text: he presented a copy of his son’s book to the Russian Embassy

nodes.description: 沃尔特在书中附上了一封给普京的信。
nodes.support_text: he had included a letter to Putin

nodes.description: 沃尔特说他随书附上了一封信。
nodes.support_text: He said he had included a letter to Putin saying...

nodes.description: 信中说到当局必须妥善处理关于FSB参与的指控。
nodes.support_text: that authorities must properly address the accusation of FSB involvement

nodes.description: 沃尔特希望普京能阅读这本书并回应人们提出的问题。
nodes.support_text: I want Putin to read the book and respond to the questions

nodes.description: 沃尔特说他希望普京读书并回应问题。
nodes.support_text: "I want Putin to read the book and respond..."

nodes.description: （请求）这本书被转交给普京。
nodes.support_text: it would be passed to Putin

nodes.description: 谢尔盖·L·洛伊科为本篇报道做出了贡献。
nodes.support_text: Sergei L. Loiko contributed to this report.

edges.support_text: The first of the apartment bombings, on Sept. 4... Then, blasts in Moscow on Sept. 9...
Then, blasts in Moscow on Sept. 9 and Sept. 13 killed 228 people.
Then, blasts in Moscow on Sept. 9 and Sept. 13 killed 228 people. The last explosion was Sept. 16 in Volgodonsk...
The last explosion was Sept. 16... Kartofelnikov and his wife returned home... on Sept. 22, 1999.
Suspicious, he called police. The car was gone by the time police arrived. But in the basement, officers discovered what appeared to be a bomb...
The discovery of the bomb was on Sept. 22. The text states the Kremlin launched its second war in Chechnya "that month" (September 1999).
警方发现疑似炸弹装置，该事件是有人试图炸毁公寓楼这一事件的一部分。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，发现装置(2)发生在检测粉末(3)之前。
发现炸弹后，Kartofelnikov开始思考，对自己说话。
The war was launched in September 1999. The FSB director's statement was made "Two days later" after the Sept. 22 bomb discovery, placing it on Sept. 24.
The events of September 1999 "contributed greatly to the popularity of the new prime minister, Vladimir V. Putin. Riding that popularity, Putin was elected president six months later."
官方声明发生在Alexei Kartofelnikov形成自己看法之前。
Putin was elected president. "The charge... was raised by challengers to Putin in the 2000 and 2004 presidential elections."
The charge was raised in the 2000 and 2004 elections. Litvinenko "made that argument in a 2002 book".
根据temporal_order，'suggest'(5)发生在'write'(6)之前，而'suggest'事件由node_10覆盖。
Litvinenko wrote the book in 2002. "Andrei Nekrasov... directed a 2004 film about the bombings..."
Nekrasov directed the film in 2004. Politkovskaya was shot "in October" (2006).
根据temporal_order，Nekrasov的陈述(7)发生在Kortunov的陈述(8)之前。
Politkovskaya was shot "in October". Litvinenko's death was "in November".
Lyudmila Knutova的采访是在主要事件（如利特维年科之死）发生后的反思性陈述，用以表达对过去事件的持续质疑，因此在时间上晚于2006年的事件。
未遂的爆炸事件发生在内政部长和FSB局长发表声明之前。
关于粉末是糖的声明发生在Alexei Kartofelnikov形成自己看法之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'plant'(1)发生在'order'(4)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'order'(4)发生在'suggest'(7)之前。
根据temporal_order，Kortunov的陈述(8)发生在袭击(9)之前。
根据temporal_order，袭击(9)发生在指控成为政治问题(10)之前。
根据temporal_order，指控成为政治问题(10)发生在允许批评者唤起记忆(11)之前。
根据temporal_order，允许批评者唤起记忆(11)发生在批评者唤起记忆(12)之前。
根据temporal_order，'consider'(1)发生在'return'(2)之前。

根据temporal_order，'come back'(2)发生在'arrive'(2)之前。
根据temporal_order，'arrive'(2)发生在'write'(4)之前。
根据temporal_order，'write'(4)发生在'tape'(5)之前。
根据temporal_order，'tape'(5)发生在'see'(6)之前。

根据动词事件的temporal_order，行使独立(0)发生在警察到达(1)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，警察到达(1)发生在发现装置(2)之前。

根据动词事件的temporal_order，检测粉末(3)发生在莫斯科方面表态(4)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，确认检测到黑索金蒸气(6)发生在官员们发现污染(7)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，轰炸格罗兹尼(4)发生在内政部长表态(5)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，莫斯科方面表态(4)发生在内政部长表态(5)之前。
根据temporal_order，'connect'(2)发生在'convict'(3)之前。
根据temporal_order，'convict'(3)发生在'say'(4)之前。
根据temporal_order，'convict'(3)发生在'say'(4)之前。
根据temporal_order，'convict'(3)发生在'say'(4)之前。
根据temporal_order，'die'(1)发生在'connect'(2)之前。
中毒导致死亡。
信件被递送是哈塔布被毒死的前提。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'acquit'(3)发生在'surface'(4)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'surface'(4)发生在'clear'(5)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'clear'(5)发生在'ask'(6)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'ask'(6)发生在'forgo'(6)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'forgo'(6)发生在'search'(6)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'search'(6)发生在'prove'(7)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'prove'(7)发生在'get'(8)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'get'(8)发生在'play'(9)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'play'(9)发生在'turn up'(10)之前。

根据动词事件的temporal_order，'listen in on'(2)发生在'alert'(3)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'alert'(3)发生在'organize'(4)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'organize'(4)发生在'say'(5)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，'say'(5)发生在'say'(5)之前，作为后续的转述。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，识别操作员(2)发生在尝试引爆(3)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，称号码来自FSB办公室(2)发生在尝试引爆(3)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，宣布尝试和失败(4)发生在公文包被污染(5)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，尝试引爆(3)发生在宣布尝试和失败(4)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，官员们发现污染(7)发生在谢尔盖耶夫对此发表评论(8)之前。
根据动词事件的temporal_order，公文包被污染(5)发生在确认检测到黑索金蒸气(6)之前。

根据temporal_order，'become'(7)发生在'know'(8)之前。

根据temporal_order，'deny'(2)发生在'want'(3)之前。
根据temporal_order，'raise'(2)发生在'want'(3)之前。
根据语义，递交书是附上信件的前提或同时发生的动作。
根据temporal_order，'present'(4)发生在'pass'(5)之前。
根据语义，先有附上信件的动作，后有对此动作的陈述。
根据temporal_order，'want'(3)发生在'present'(4)之前，表明意图先于行动。
根据temporal_order，'pass'(5)发生在'contribute'(7)之前。
